entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1200 metres this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
